body.bibl: Heijer, Johannes den. “Towards an Inventory of Middle and Mixed Arabic Features: The Inscriptions of Deir Mar Musa (Syria) as a Case Study.” In Middle Arabic and Mixed Arabic: Diachrony and Synchrony, edited by Liesbeth Zack and Arie Schippers, 157–73.
